title: Getting Started with Systems Engineering
excerpt: An overview of systems engineering principles and how to apply them in real-world projects.
author: John Smith
content:
What is Systems Engineering?

Systems engineering is an interdisciplinary approach to designing and managing complex systems throughout their life cycles.

Core Principles

  • Requirements Analysis
  • System Architecture
  • Integration and Testing

Why Use Systems Engineering?

It helps ensure that all aspects of a project are considered and integrated into a unified whole.
